#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int i,j, num;
	for (i = 0; i < 10; i++)
	{
		int count = 0;
		int tmp[42] = { 0 };

		cin >> num;
		tmp[(num % 42)]++;
		cin >> num;
		tmp[(num % 42)]++;
		cin >> num;
		tmp[(num % 42)]++;
		cin >> num;
		tmp[(num % 42)]++;
		cin >> num;
		tmp[(num % 42)]++;
		cin >> num;
		tmp[(num % 42)]++;
		cin >> num;
		tmp[(num % 42)]++;
		cin >> num;
		tmp[(num % 42)]++;
		cin >> num;
		tmp[(num % 42)]++;
		cin >> num;
		tmp[(num % 42)]++;

		for (j = 0; j < 42; j++)
			if (tmp[j] != 0)
				count++;

		cout << count << endl;
	}
}
